item.title: Nebula level07 write-up
item.description: In Level07 we are given the source code of a perl script: #!/usr/bin/perl use CGI qw{param}; print "Content-type: text/html\n\n"; sub ping { $host = $_[0]; print("<html><head><title>Ping results</title></head><body><pre>"); @output = `ping -c 3 $host 2>&1`; foreach $line (@output) { print "$line"; } print("</pre></body></html>"); } # check if Host set. if not, display normal page, etc ping(param("Host")); It looks like its vulnerable to command injection on line 12. Bit how and where is it deployed.
